articles.title: ‘This is only the beginning’: Ann Michael Maye shares encouraging message after Patriots Super Bowl loss
articles.description:
"Not how we wanted it to end but still thanking God for this incredible season"

The post ‘This is only the beginning’: Ann Michael Maye shares encouraging message after Patriots Super Bowl loss appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Ann Michael Maye expresses gratitude despite the Patriots' Super Bowl loss on February 12, 2026.
Maye emphasizes optimism for future seasons, stating, 'This is only the beginning.'
Local fans are encouraged to remain hopeful as the team looks to improve.

articles.title: ‘Love Story’ revisits JFK Jr. and Carolyn Bessette. It’s stirred some backlash.
articles.description:
It details a meet cute at a party and culminates in the deaths of the couple and Bessette's sister Lauren Bessette on July 16, 1999, when a small plane piloted by Kennedy crashed into the Atlantic Ocean.

The post ‘Love Story’ revisits JFK Jr. and Carolyn Bessette. It’s stirred some backlash. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Film 'Love Story' portrays JFK Jr. and Carolyn Bessette's romance and tragic end.
The couple, along with Lauren Bessette, died in a plane crash on July 16, 1999.
Local residents express backlash over the film's portrayal of their lives and deaths.

articles.title: EPA ends credits for automatic start-stop vehicle ignition, a feature Zeldin says ‘everyone hates’
articles.description:
In remarks with President Donald Trump on Thursday at the White House, Zeldin called start-stop technology the “Obama switch” and said it makes vehicles “die” at every red light and stop sign.

The post EPA ends credits for automatic start-stop vehicle ignition, a feature Zeldin says ‘everyone hates’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: EPA ends credits for automatic start-stop vehicle ignition technology effective immediately.
Congressman Lee Zeldin criticizes the feature, calling it the 'Obama switch' during a White House event.
Boston drivers may experience changes in vehicle performance and fuel efficiency due to this decision.

articles.title: This dad is running Boston to give back to Boston Children’s Hospital
articles.description:
"I’m proud to be running with my son as my patient partner — he’s my inspiration, my motivation, and the reason behind every mile."

The post This dad is running Boston to give back to Boston Children’s Hospital appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Nick Gallagher is running the Boston Marathon to support Boston Children's Hospital.
He runs with his son as his patient partner, emphasizing personal motivation.
Funds raised will directly benefit pediatric care at Boston Children's Hospital.

articles.title: Her great-grandfather ran the Boston Marathon in 1920. Now she’s doing the same.
articles.description:
Juliette Barney is running the 2026 Boston Marathon to support the Youth Advocacy Foundation's work protecting and empowering youth.

The post Her great-grandfather ran the Boston Marathon in 1920. Now she’s doing the same. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Juliette Barney will run the 2026 Boston Marathon, continuing her family's legacy.
Her great-grandfather participated in the marathon in 1920, marking a century of tradition.
Barney aims to raise funds for the Youth Advocacy Foundation to support local youth.

articles.title: Should Boston rebuild Madison Park at Roxbury’s P-3 site?
articles.description:
Developers had planned to build a mixed-use campus with lab space and affordable housing. Now, the city wants to use the parcel for a new Madison Park vocational high school.

The post Should Boston rebuild Madison Park at Roxbury’s P-3 site? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston plans to replace mixed-use campus with a new Madison Park vocational high school.
Developers initially proposed affordable housing and lab space for the Roxbury P-3 site.
The decision aims to enhance vocational education opportunities for local students.
